name: Thirty Troops Pack
description: Unlocked when someone is about to place 30+ troops on the board and has a missile. Adds massive army bonuses and new territory types.

modifiers.description: Adds special territory types including Alien Island

data.title: Special Territories
data.summary: Certain territories have unique properties and bonuses

alien_island.title: Alien Island
alien_island.content: A mysterious island territory with powerful technological benefits.

rules.text: Alien Island is a territory connected to two other territories via sea-lines. It is the 8th island on this board. It is not part of any continent
Controlling Alien Island grants +1 to all dice rolls in combat (attacking or defending)
Alien Island counts as +3 population for recruitment purposes
Conquering Alien Island from another player awards 1 Red Star token

ruins.title: Ruins
ruins.content: Destroyed cities leave behind ruins with special properties.

rules.text: When the Alien player destroys a city and replaces it with a ruin, that territory no longer contains a city
A ruin cannot be fortified and is not considered a city
You can rebuild a city over a ruin

modifiers.description: Adds bonuses for massive army recruitment

data.title: Massive Army Bonuses
data.content: Players recruiting exceptionally large armies gain additional strategic bonuses.

rules.text: When recruiting 30+ troops in a single turn, gain +3 additional troops
When recruiting 30+ troops, you may draw 1 additional Resource card at end of turn even if you didn't conquer a territory

examples.scenario: Player recruits 32 troops through cards and territories
examples.explanation: Player receives 32 + 3 = 35 troops total and can draw an extra card

rule.text: When attacking with 10+ troops against 3 or fewer defenders, attacker rolls an additional die (max 4 dice)
